Title: mofh Vulnerable to Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference
Description: The `xml.etree.ElementTree` module that mofh used up until version `1.0.1` implements a simple and efficient API for parsing and creating XML data. But it makes the application vulnerable to Billion Laughs attack. It is a type of denial-of-service attack aimed at XML parsers. It uses multiple levels of nested entities.
